solution_line_template: There are fresh mangos in {total_dishes} / {fresh_mango_divisor} = <<{total_dishes}/{fresh_mango_divisor}={dishes_with_fresh_mango}>>{dishes_with_fresh_mango} dishes.

Thus, there are {mango_salsa_dishes} + {dishes_with_fresh_mango} + {mango_jelly_dish} = <<{mango_salsa_dishes}+{dishes_with_fresh_mango}+{mango_jelly_dish}={total_mango_dishes}>>{total_mango_dishes} dishes with mango on the buffet.

Oliver can pick the mango out of {dishes_oliver_can_pick_out} of the dishes, so there are {total_mango_dishes} - {dishes_oliver_can_pick_out} = <<{total_mango_dishes}-{dishes_oliver_can_pick_out}={dishes_oliver_wont_eat}>>{dishes_oliver_wont_eat} dishes he won't eat.
Thus, there are {total_dishes} - {dishes_oliver_wont_eat} = <<{total_dishes}-{dishes_oliver_wont_eat}={dishes_left_for_oliver}>>{dishes_left_for_oliver} dishes left for Oliver on the buffet.
